item.description:
Local band Jim's Big Ego is pairing up with Shawn Peters a/k/a "The Oracle" for a night of music and fortune. Come to the Back Room of The Burren prepared with thought-provoking questions which will be answered in both song and prose by the members of JBE and The Oracle, aided by the band's own version of a Wheel of Fortune. The show is hilarious -- the last event in June at the Lizard Lounge involved insightful answers to a wide variety of audience questions, including "What is the fate of the Boston Globe", "Will I ever rule my own island?", and "Why did the plumber put the pipe there?"

Be there on time - the show will likely sell out! Cover charge is likely $10 or under, drinks and food can be purchased inside.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: The Ego and The Oracle - Cool Music and Your Fortune Revealed!
